review: This is our best option for consistent quality while streaming.  We have a nice computer hooked up to our home entertainment system & even Netflix works better & seems to stream more smoothly on this Amazon Fire TV.  Our broadband speed fluctuates some (rural cellular) but the Fire TV often pre-downloads the next show in a series you're watching ... so it's ready!  No pausing to buffer!  The other super-cool ability is to mirror my Kindle Fire HD which can also download some of the Prime Instant Videos / Movies.  So we've got 2 options to watch streamed content in HD on our sometimes slower connection, without having to downres or wait to buffer.
author: PW
